title: Chrome rolling out new Android widgets & ‘Journeys’ that auto-group your history by topic
content:
Google is rolling out a pair of new Android widgets for Chrome today, while making official the previously experimental “Journeys” feature that lets you “revisit past explorations grouped by topic.”

more…

The post Chrome rolling out new Android widgets & ‘Journeys’ that auto-group your history by topic appeared first on 9to5Google.
